name: Tiny Dreams (oohicksyoo)
description:
This is a sample of using my new game engine Toe Beans. The goal of this was to create a 2D renderer that would load & parser aseprite files for a faster workflow within the engine. 
The game is only currently hooked up to a controller so please make sure you have one before you begin. 

Currently running in Debug mode as the whole release pipeline is not complete yet.

Made for the Honest Jam 3 to help support the charity by making a game.
